# Project Structure

## runtime
* The runtime folder contains a main folders chalicelib.  
* Inside the chalicelib folder all the main code is written in api, models and serializers. You can add any code, directories or files into this.
* The migrations folder contains files related to migrations on database. Inside this there is a env.py file which runs online or offile migrations. The versions folder inside this have the autogenerated migration files.
* The requirements.txt and .gitignore files have their usual meaning.
* Commands related to chalice should be run inside the runtime directory.  
* Commands related to alembic should be run inside the chalicelib directory.  

## infrastructure
* This folder is for chalice deployment. Make your changes to the chaliceapp.py file inside the stacks folder and run the necessary commands to deploy it.
* All the cdk related commands have to run inside this directory.
* The requirements.txt and .gitignore files have their usual meaning.

## env
* This folder contains all the env related files. You can directly change the files here for your environment or our platform also supports chnaging of env variables. More info about this on the environment management doc.

## docs
* This contains all the documents you can refer for your help.
